value.name: Cariol Horne’s long fight over 'doing the right thing'
value.description: What the former Buffalo Police officer did long before George Floyd is relevant, and so is the voice of Greg Kwiatkowski.

video.name: Cariol Horne’s long fight over 'doing the right thing'

value.name: Fired Buffalo police officer who stopped fellow cop’s chokehold on Black suspect wins pension
value.description: "Quoting the words of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., 'the time is always right to do right,'" Judge Dennis Ward wrote in his decision. She is pushing for the nationwide adoption of "Cariol's Law ...

value.name: ‘I’m just crazy.’ A Florida Keys boy, 11, attacked two students with scissors, police say
value.description: An 11-year-old Florida Keys boy stabbed two boys at Sugarloaf School with scissors on May 7, 2021, police said. File photo An 11-year-old boy was taken into custody Tuesday after the Monroe County ...

value.name: A judge reinstated the pension of a Black police officer fired after stopping a white colleague's chokehold, citing George Floyd
value.description: A judge ruled Tuesday that the City of Buffalo must reinstate the pension of Cariol Horne, a Black police officer it fired after she stopped a white colleague's chokehold on a handcuffed man in 2006.
